data.title: Muhammad Yunus: ‘Education gives us a passenger mentality – but we are the pilots of this planet’
data.meta_description: Yunus the entrepreneur turned the banking system in Bangladesh on its head and made microfinance a global phenomenon. But Yunus the teacher has still got work to do. At 84 – and facing a possible prison sentence – there's no time to waste.
data.text: Yunus the entrepreneur was a true disruptor, turning the banking system in Bangladesh on its head, and ultimately making microfinance a global phenomenon. But Yunus the teacher has still got work to do, he tells us. At 84 – and facing a possible prison sentence – there's no time to waste.
